comments.body: this is mostly equivalent but more efficient (only opens & redirects once) and shellcheck prefers grouping commands when you appear to be redirecting many commands to the same place
we could turn off the lint instead, but this is actually a minor improvement

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +50,54 @@// AUTO-GENERATED FUNCTIONS START HERE. DO NOT EDIT.
EOF
  } > "${TMPFILE}"

  go run cmd/genswaggertypedocs/swagger_type_docs.go -s \

comments.body: non-trivial assignment should be separate from declaration in order to not swallow the error

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@  local gv_dir=$2
  local TMPFILE
  TMPFILE="${TMPDIR:-/tmp}/types_swagger_doc_generated.$(date +%s).go"

  echo "Generating swagger type docs for ${group_version} at ${gv_dir}"

comments.body: How sure are we that this is precise enough?  Maybe "^Last updated.*UTC$" ?
